text: Cyprinus yilongensis, the Yilong Lake carp, is an extinct species of carp found in Yilong Lake. Drainage of the lake caused the extinction of this species. == References == # Froese, Rainer; Pauly, Daniel (eds.) (2006). "Cyprinus yilongensis" in FishBase. April 2006 version. Category:IUCN Red List extinct species Category:Cypriniformes Category:Extinct fish Category:Ray- finned fish Category:Freshwater fish
title: Cyprinus yilongensis
